${ModID}:Necropotence.NAME: Necropotence
${ModID}:Necropotence.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! card. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.
${ModID}:Necropotence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose 1 HP. NL Return this card to your hand.

${ModID}:FireblessedBlade.NAME: Fire-blessed Blade
${ModID}:FireblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 1 Focus. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:WindblessedBlade.NAME: Wind-blessed Blade
${ModID}:WindblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 3 times. NL Gain !B! Block 2 times. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EarthblessedBlade.NAME: Earth-blessed Blade
${ModID}:EarthblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B! ${ModID}:Plated Armor. NL Gain !M! Thorns. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:IceblessedBlade.NAME: Ice-blessed Blade
${ModID}:IceblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Gain 1 *Buffer. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:VoidblessedBlade.NAME: Void-blessed Blade
${ModID}:VoidblessedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Gain 1 *Blur. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Languish.NAME: Languish
${ModID}:Languish.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn and lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:Languish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn and lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:MirarisWake.NAME: Mirari's Wake
${ModID}:MirarisWake.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the start of your turn gain [E] .
${ModID}:MirarisWake.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E] .

${ModID}:LightningHelix.NAME: Lightning Helix
${ModID}:LightningHelix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SteelWall.NAME: Steel Wall
${ModID}:SteelWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Metallicize. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:LightningBolt.NAME: Lightning Bolt
${ModID}:LightningBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Staggershock.NAME: Staggershock
${ModID}:Staggershock.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. At the start of your next turn, play this card again.

${ModID}:HandOfTheAbyss.NAME: Hand of the Abyss
${ModID}:HandOfTheAbyss.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage, apply !M! ${ModID}:Abysstouched.

${ModID}:BrokenCrystal.NAME: Broken Crystal
${ModID}:BrokenCrystal.DESCRIPTION: When you draw this, randomize its cost and draw a card. NL Reduce regeneration of ALL enemies by !M!. NL Exhaust.
